Type locality. China
: Yunnan : Lijiang : Baishui [River]
.

Remarks: Wu (2004) described
A. ( A. ) furcatum
and
A. ( A. ) striatum based
on specimens of the opposite sex. We confirm here that
A. ( A. ) furcatum
and
A. ( A. ) striatum
are conspecific based on both sexes co-occurring simultaneously at several sites. Because
A. furcatum Wu, 2004
is an unavailable junior primary homonym of
A. furcatum Ducke, 1908
,
A. ( A. ) striatum Wu, 2004
is the valid name.
